short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you book hotels on Booking.com!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For Booking.com users who are dissatisfied with its inconvenient user interface, this extension provides a straightforward way for comparing hotels.
The extension allows you to save hotels to your list by clicking the heart icon next to room listings and to then create a chart comparing your saved hotels by clicking the Booking Helper icon.
